message.body: Hurt back v badly at dr now; sorry haven't responded to email yet: think I will probs still be bed rest tomorrow :(
Oh dear do you need anything? is anyone helping you I am around if you need anything. I'll be right by you around two so please don't hesitate to cal
Turns out I have a kidney infection
Well thank god you went to the doctor. What can I do lovely? Please I'll be in the city till Thursday im staying at Wendy's so im close to everything.
Hi! Still pretty shakey, can you come by Thursday?
Oh baby I'm so sorry I am going out of town but I'm around all tomorrow and I can come by early in the morning on Thursday if that Helps
O it's ok love, I'd love to see you if in feeling up to it, going to sleep now but lets talk tomorrow
Dyou want to come over tonight?
